content:
API Documentation url:
https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/

Connect Canva integrations
Connect Canva with any of your favorite apps in just a few clicks. Design, build, and automate anything for your work by integrating apps like Canva to create visual automated workflows. Choose from thousands of ready-made apps or use our no-code toolkit to connect to apps not yet in our library.

Canva

Action
Canva
Create a Design
Creates a new design.

Action
Canva
Create a Folder
Creates a new folder.

Action
Canva
Get a Folder
Retrieves details about an existing folder.

Action
Canva
Make an API Call
Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

Action
Canva
Move a Folder Item
Moves items from one folder to another.

Action
Canva
Upload an Image
Uploads an image to a user’s content library. When specifying an image that already exists, it's renamed.
get me information about a service, most common usages give list of API actions.

actions and triggers for the canva service. I want to create Appmixer connector to utilize most common actions on the canva API, include a documentation link for each component, endpoint URL, HTTP method - GET, POST, PUT, PATCH. Provide API base URL, provide list of inputs for each component.
Create the service json as well, (serviceJson property)
ignore input parameters for pagination, it could be for example page, offset, limit, etc.

Action naming conventions: Try to avoid naming with "List", such as "List Users", "List Contacts" etc. Use "Find" instead. For example "Find Users", "FInd Contacts". These actions have usually input parameters for search, such as "query", "search" or similar.

Provide information about authentication, include type of authentication, and other properties. Provide information about authentication endpoint URL, token URL for managing access token - for obtaining access token and refreshing access token. Provide information about profile info URL, where is possible to get information about current user. It is used for getting user profile information, such as email, name, etc. (authentication property)

{"actions":[{"title":"Create a Design","description":"Creates a new design.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#create-a-design","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/designs","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"POST","sampleResponse":{"id":"design_12345","name":"New Design","created_at":"2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the design"},"template_id":{"type":"string","description":"Optional template ID to base the design on"},"dimensions":{"type":"object","properties":{"width":{"type":"integer","description":"Width in pixels"},"height":{"type":"integer","description":"Height in pixels"}},"description":"Dimensions of the design"}},"required":["name"]}},{"title":"Create a Folder","description":"Creates a new folder.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#create-a-folder","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/folders","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"POST","sampleResponse":{"id":"folder_12345","name":"New Folder","created_at":"2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the folder"},"parent_folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the parent folder, if any"}},"required":["name"]}},{"title":"Get a Folder","description":"Retrieves details about an existing folder.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#get-a-folder","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/folders/{folder_id}","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"GET","sampleResponse":{"id":"folder_12345","name":"Folder Name","created_at":"2024-01-01T12:00:00Z"},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the folder to retrieve"}},"required":["folder_id"]}},{"title":"Make an API Call","description":"Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#make-an-api-call","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/{path}","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"POST","sampleResponse":{},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"path":{"type":"string","description":"API path to call, e.g. 'designs'"},"method":{"type":"string","enum":["GET","POST","PUT","PATCH","DELETE"],"description":"HTTP method to use"},"body":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for the API call"},"query_params":{"type":"object","description":"Query parameters for the API call"}},"required":["path","method"]}},{"title":"Move a Folder Item","description":"Moves items from one folder to another.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#move-a-folder-item","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/folder-items/move","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"POST","sampleResponse":{"success":true},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"item_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the item to move"},"source_folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the source folder"},"destination_folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the destination folder"}},"required":["item_id","source_folder_id","destination_folder_id"]}},{"title":"Upload an Image","description":"Uploads an image to a user’s content library. When specifying an image that already exists, it's renamed.","type":"action","documentation":"https://www.canva.dev/docs/connect/#upload-an-image","endpointUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/images/upload","apiBaseUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1","method":"POST","sampleResponse":{"id":"image_12345","url":"https://cdn.canva.com/image_12345.jpg"},"inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"file_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the image file"},"file_data":{"type":"string","description":"Base64 encoded image data"},"folder_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the folder to upload the image into"}},"required":["file_name","file_data"]}}],"authentication":{"type":"oauth2","authUrl":"https://accounts.canva.com/oauth2/auth","tokenUrl":"https://accounts.canva.com/oauth2/token","profileInfoUrl":"https://api.canva.com/v1/users/me"},"serviceJson":{"name":"appmixer.canva","label":"Canva","category":"applications","description":"Connect Canva with your favorite apps to create visual automated workflows and automate design tasks.","version":"1.0.0","icon":"https://static.canva.com/web/favicon.ico"}}
